definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Neither the pillar of cloud by day nor the pillar of fire by night left its place in front of the people.
sentences.chinese: 日間雲柱，夜間火柱，總不離開百姓的面前。

sentences.english: He took not away the pillar of the cloud by day， nor the pillar of fire by night， from before the people.
sentences.chinese: 日間雲柱，夜間火柱，總不離開百姓的面前。

sentences.english: Press on! If necessary, we will find even the pillar of cloud and fire to mark our journey through the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 在必需的時候，我們也能得到雲柱和火柱的引領。

sentences.english: The pillar of fire by night remained with them until they reached the promised land.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜的火柱始終伴隨他們直到他們到達所應許之地。

sentences.english: In Numbers, he is the pillar of cloud by day, or the pillar of fire by night.
sentences.chinese: 在民數記中，他是日間的雲柱，和夜間的火柱。

definition: stream of water (as from a fountain or a faucet)/jet of water
